tool_description: Measures free and total chlorine residual levels to assess disinfection effectiveness and ensure proper water treatment levels without over-chlorination.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

chlorine_type.description: Type of chlorine to measure: free_chlorine, total_chlorine, or combined_chlorine

measurement_method.description: Testing method: colorimetric, digital_meter, or test_strips

error_messages: Invalid chlorine type: Must be one of [free_chlorine, total_chlorine, combined_chlorine]
Invalid measurement method: Must be one of [colorimetric, digital_meter, test_strips]
Sample age exceeded: Chlorine levels change rapidly; test immediately after sampling
Interference present: Other oxidizing agents affecting chlorine measurement
usage: Provide sample ID and specify chlorine type and measurement method. Test immediately after sampling as chlorine levels change rapidly. Avoid contamination during testing.

disinfection_adequacy.description: Whether chlorine levels are adequate for disinfection

taste_odor_impact.description: Expected impact on water taste and odor
